description: Golden set evaluation after AD-001 fix (multi-anchor matching)

1.00.note: RECOMMENDED for automated clustering. Zero false positives.

1.20.note: All false positives are genetically-related family members (Capelutos).

dominant_confusion_pairs: Betty Capeluto Fox <-> Victoria Capuano Capeluto (family)
Betty Capeluto Fox <-> Anita Capeluto Franco (family)
false_positive_analysis.conclusion: Family resemblance is the primary source of false positives in this archive. This is expected for a single-family photo collection.

recommendation.rationale: At 1.0, precision is 100% (no false positives). The cost of a false positive (manual undo, ~5 clicks) far exceeds the cost of a false negative (manual merge, ~2 clicks). The user can always manually merge missed matches via Find Similar.
